meanings.sent1: She valiantly faced her fears and stood tall.
meanings.sent2: The knight valiantly charged into battle to protect the kingdom.
meanings.sent3: The little squirrel valiantly tried to climb the tall tree but kept slipping.
meanings.sent4: The firefighter valiantly battled the raging flames to save the family trapped inside.
meanings.sent5: The student valiantly studied for hours to ace the difficult exam.

meanings.definition: In a brave or heroic manner.
meanings.sent1: He valiantly rescued the kitten from the tree with a ladder.
meanings.sent2: The superhero valiantly fought off the villains to save the city.
meanings.sent3: The chef valiantly tried to cook a gourmet meal but ended up burning it.
meanings.sent4: The athlete valiantly pushed through the pain to reach the finish line first.
meanings.sent5: The explorer valiantly ventured into the unknown jungle to discover new species.
